The name of the region.
The number of replicas of the Image Version to be created per region. This property is updatable.
Specifies the storage account type to be used to store the image. This property is not updatable.
This is the OS disk image.
The host caching of the disk. Valid values are 'None', 'ReadOnly', and 'ReadWrite'
The source for the disk image.
The source of the gallery artifact version.
The id of the gallery artifact version source. Can specify a disk uri, snapshot uri, user image or storage account resource.

argGroup.name: Properties
argGroup.arg:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetRegions" options="target-regions">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetRegions[].encryption.dataDiskImages" options="data-disk-images">
